mapper.select:
select count(*) from xmk_wqgz t where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'

select gydw v_0,xzqhdm v_1,xzqhmc v_2,lxbm v_3,lxmc v_4,qlbh v_5,qlmc v_6,qlzxzh v_7,xjgjnd v_8,qlqc v_9,qlkd v_10, kjzc v_11,dkzdkj v_12,akjfl v_13,sbjgxs v_14,pddj v_15,bhnr v_16,bz v_17 from xmk_wqgz where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'

select * from ( select rownum num ,t.* from (select * from sck_wqgz t join xmk_wqgz on xmkid=xmk_wqgz.id) t where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
) t1 where t1.num <=(#{page} * #{rows}) and t1.num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows} order by decode(sck_sbthcd,#{sbthcd},'未上报',sck_sbzt),sck_shzt desc

select count(*) from (select * from sck_wqgz t join xmk_wqgz on xmkid=xmk_wqgz.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'

select qlbh v_0,qlmc v_1,qlzxzh v_2,qlqc v_3,qlkd v_4,fapgdw v_5,fascdw v_6,faspsj v_7,spwh v_8,tzgs v_9,jsxz v_10, jsnr v_11,bz v_12 from (select * from sck_wqgz t join xmk_wqgz on xmkid=xmk_wqgz.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'

select * from ( select rownum as num,t.* from ( select * from plan_wqgz jh left join sck_wqgz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_wqgz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
order by jh.sbzt,jh.spzt,jh.sbnf desc ) t ) where num <= (#{page} * #{rows}) and num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows}

select count(*) from plan_wqgz jh left join sck_wqgz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_wqgz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'

select lx.gydw v_0,lx.xzqhdm v_1,lx.xzqhmc v_2,lx.lxbm v_3,lx.lxmc v_4,lx.qlbh v_5,lx.qlmc v_6,lx.qlzxzh v_7,lx.xjgjnd v_8, jh.sjdw v_9,jh.sjpfdw v_10,jh.pfwh v_11,jh.pfztz v_12,jh.jhsybzje v_13,jh.jhsydfzcje v_14,jh.sfsqablbz v_15,jh.ablbzsqwh v_16 from plan_wqgz jh left join sck_wqgz sc on (jh.sckid = sc.sckid) left join xmk_wqgz lx on (sc.xmkid = lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
order by jh.sbnf desc

select count(*) from xmk_abgc t where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'

select gydw v_0,xzqhdm v_1,xzqhmc v_2,lxbm v_3,lxmc v_4,qdzh v_5,zdzh v_6,qzlc v_7,yhlc v_8,gjxjnd v_9,yhnr v_10,bz v_11 from xmk_abgc where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
order by decode(sbthcd,#{sbthcd},'未上报',sbzt),shzt desc

select * from ( select rownum num ,t.* from (select * from sck_abgc t join xmk_abgc on xmkid=xmk_abgc.id) t where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
) t1 where t1.num <=(#{page} * #{rows}) and t1.num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows} order by decode(sck_sbthcd,#{sbthcd},'未上报',sck_sbzt),sck_shzt desc

select count(*) from (select * from sck_abgc t join xmk_abgc on xmkid=xmk_abgc.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'

select gydw v_0,xzqhdm v_1,xzqhmc v_2,lxbm v_3,lxmc v_4,t.scqdzh v_5,t.sczdzh v_6,t.sczlc v_7,t.scyhlc v_8,gjxjnd v_9,fapgdw v_10, fascdw v_11,faspsj v_12,spwh v_13,tzgs v_14,jsxz v_15,jsnr v_16,bz v_17 from (select * from sck_abgc t join xmk_abgc on xmkid=xmk_abgc.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'

select * from ( select rownum as num,t.* from ( select * from plan_abgc jh left join sck_abgc sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_abgc lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
order by jh.sbzt,jh.spzt ) t ) where num <= (#{page} * #{rows}) and num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows}

select count(*) from plan_abgc jh left join sck_abgc sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_abgc lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'

select lx.gydw v_0,lx.xzqhdm v_1,lx.xzqhmc v_2,lx.lxbm v_3,lx.lxmc v_4,sc.scqdzh v_5,sc.sczdzh v_6,sc.sczlc v_7,sc.scyhlc v_8,lx.gjxjnd v_9, jh.sjdw v_10,jh.sjpfdw v_11,jh.pfwh v_12,jh.pfztz v_13,jh.jhsybbzje v_14,jh.jhsydfzczj v_15,jh.sfsqablbz v_16,jh.ablbzsqwh v_17 from plan_abgc jh left join sck_abgc sc on (jh.sckid = sc.sckid) left join xmk_abgc lx on (sc.xmkid = lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')

order by jh.sbzt,jh.spzt

and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'

select gydw v_0,xzqhdm v_1,xzqhmc v_2,lxbm v_3,lxmc v_4,qdzh v_5,zdzh v_6,qzlc v_7,yhlc v_8,gjxjnd v_9,yhnr v_10,bz v_11 from xmk_zhfz where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')

and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'

select gydw v_0,xzqhdm v_1,xzqhmc v_2,lxbm v_3,lxmc v_4,t.scqdzh v_5,t.sczdzh v_6,t.sczlc v_7,t.scyhlc v_8,gjxjnd v_9,fapgdw v_10, fascdw v_11,faspsj v_12,spwh v_13,tzgs v_14,jsxz v_15,jsnr v_16,bz v_17 from (select * from sck_zhfz t join xmk_zhfz on xmkid=xmk_zhfz.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')

select * from ( select rownum as num,t.* from ( select * from plan_zhfz jh left join sck_zhfz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_zhfz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
order by jh.sbzt,jh.spzt ) t ) where num <= (#{page} * #{rows}) and num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows}

select count(*) from plan_zhfz jh left join sck_zhfz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_zhfz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'

select lx.gydw v_0,lx.xzqhdm v_1,lx.xzqhmc v_2,lx.lxbm v_3,lx.lxmc v_4,sc.scqdzh v_5,sc.sczdzh v_6,sc.sczlc v_7,sc.scyhlc v_8,lx.gjxjnd v_9, jh.sjdw v_10,jh.sjpfdw v_11,jh.pfwh v_12,jh.pfztz v_13,jh.jhsybzje v_14,jh.jhsydfzcje v_15,jh.sfsqablbz v_16,jh.ablbzsqwh v_17 from plan_zhfz jh left join sck_zhfz sc on (jh.sckid = sc.sckid) left join xmk_zhfz lx on (sc.xmkid = lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
order by jh.sbzt,jh.spzt

select * from ( select rownum as num,t.* from ( select * from plan_wqgz jh left join sck_wqgz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_wqgz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and substr(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)),0,length(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)))-1)<=to_number(#{xmnf})
order by jh.sbzt,jh.spzt ) t ) where num <= (#{page} * #{rows}) and num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows}

select count(*) from plan_wqgz jh left join sck_wqgz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_wqgz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and substr(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)),0,length(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)))-1)<=to_number(#{xmnf})

select lx.gydw v_0,lx.xzqhdm v_1,lx.xzqhmc v_2,lx.lxbm v_3,lx.lxmc v_4,lx.qlbh v_5,lx.qlmc v_6,lx.qlzxzh v_7,jh.xdsj v_8, jh.jhkgsj v_9,jh.jhwgsj v_10,jh.sjkgsj v_11,jh.sgdw v_12,jh.jldw v_13,jh.htje v_14 from plan_wqgz jh left join sck_wqgz sc on (jh.sckid = sc.sckid) left join xmk_wqgz lx on (sc.xmkid = lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and substr(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)),0,length(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)))-1)<=to_number(#{xmnf})
order by jh.sbzt,jh.spzt

select * from ( select rownum as num,t.* from ( select * from plan_abgc jh left join sck_abgc sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_abgc lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and substr(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)),0,length(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)))-1)<=to_number(#{xmnf})
order by jh.sbzt,jh.spzt ) t ) where num <= (#{page} * #{rows}) and num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows}

select count(*) from plan_abgc jh left join sck_abgc sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_abgc lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and substr(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)),0,length(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)))-1)<=to_number(#{xmnf})

select lx.gydw v_0,lx.xzqhdm v_1,lx.xzqhmc v_2,lx.lxbm v_3,lx.lxmc v_4,sc.scqdzh v_5,sc.sczdzh v_6,sc.sczlc v_7,sc.scyhlc v_8, jh.xdsj v_9,jh.jhkgsj v_10,jh.jhwgsj v_11,jh.sjkgsj v_12,jh.sgdw v_13,jh.jldw v_14,jh.htje v_15 from plan_abgc jh left join sck_abgc sc on (jh.sckid = sc.sckid) left join xmk_abgc lx on (sc.xmkid = lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and substr(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)),0,length(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)))-1)<=to_number(#{xmnf})
order by jh.sbzt,jh.spzt

select * from ( select rownum as num,t.* from ( select * from plan_zhfz jh left join sck_zhfz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_zhfz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and substr(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)),0,length(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)))-1)<=to_number(#{xmnf})
order by jh.sbzt,jh.spzt ) t ) where num <= (#{page} * #{rows}) and num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows}

select count(*) from plan_zhfz jh left join sck_zhfz sc on (jh.sckid=sc.sckid) left join xmk_zhfz lx on (sc.xmkid=lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and substr(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)),0,length(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)))-1)<=to_number(#{xmnf})

select lx.gydw v_0,lx.xzqhdm v_1,lx.xzqhmc v_2,lx.lxbm v_3,lx.lxmc v_4,sc.scqdzh v_5,sc.sczdzh v_6,sc.sczlc v_7,sc.scyhlc v_8, jh.xdsj v_9,jh.jhkgsj v_10,jh.jhwgsj v_11,jh.sjkgsj v_12,jh.sgdw v_13,jh.jldw v_14,jh.htje v_15 from plan_zhfz jh left join sck_zhfz sc on (jh.sckid = sc.sckid) left join xmk_zhfz lx on (sc.xmkid = lx.id) where 1=1
and gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
and substr(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)),0,length(trim(substr(sjkgsj,4,3)))-1)<=to_number(#{xmnf})
order by jh.sbzt,jh.spzt

select count(*) from (select sum(wc_btz),sum(wc_qttz),max(sbsj) sbsj,jhid from gcgl_wqgz where substr(sbyf,6,length(sbyf)-5) <=to_number(#{xmnf}) group by jhid )gc left join sck_wqgz sc on (gc.jhid=sc.sckid) left join plan_wqgz jh on (sc.sckid=jh.sckid) left join xmk_wqgz jc on sc.xmkid=jc.id
where gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')

select lx.xzqhdm v_0,lx.xzqhmc v_1,lx.lxbm v_2,lx.lxmc v_3,lx.qlbh v_4,lx.qlmc v_5,gc.sbsj v_6,jh.yjjgsj v_7,gc.wc_btz v_8, gc.wc_qttz v_9,jh.sjwgsj v_10,jh.bz v_11 from (select sum(wc_btz) wc_btz,sum(wc_qttz) wc_qttz,max(sbsj) sbsj,jhid from gcgl_wqgz where substr(sbyf,6,length(sbyf)-5) <=to_number(#{xmnf}) group by jhid )gc left join sck_wqgz sc on (gc.jhid=sc.sckid) left join plan_wqgz jh on (sc.sckid=jh.sckid) left join xmk_wqgz lx on sc.xmkid=lx.id
where gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
order by wc_btz

select count(*) from (select sum(wc_btz),sum(wc_qttz),max(sbsj) sbsj,jhid from gcgl_abgc where substr(sbyf,6,length(sbyf)-5) <=to_number(#{xmnf}) group by jhid)gc left join sck_abgc sc on (gc.jhid=sc.sckid) left join plan_abgc jh on (sc.sckid=jh.sckid) left join xmk_abgc jc on sc.xmkid=jc.id
where gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')

select lx.xzqhdm v_0,lx.xzqhmc v_1,lx.lxbm v_2,lx.lxmc v_3,sc.scqdzh v_4,sc.sczdzh v_5,gc.sbsj v_6,jh.yjwgsj v_7,gc.wc_btz v_8, gc.wc_qttz v_9,jh.sjwgsj v_10,lx.bz v_11 from (select sum(wc_btz) wc_btz,sum(wc_qttz) wc_qttz,max(sbsj) sbsj,jhid from gcgl_abgc where substr(sbyf,6,length(sbyf)-5) <=to_number(#{xmnf}) group by jhid )gc left join sck_abgc sc on (gc.jhid=sc.sckid) left join plan_abgc jh on (sc.sckid=jh.sckid) left join xmk_abgc lx on sc.xmkid=lx.id
where gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
order by wc_btz

select count(*) from (select sum(wc_btz),sum(wc_qttz),max(sbsj) sbsj,jhid from gcgl_zhfz where substr(sbyf,6,length(sbyf)-5) <=to_number(#{xmnf}) group by jhid)gc left join sck_zhfz sc on (gc.jhid=sc.sckid) left join plan_zhfz jh on (sc.sckid=jh.sckid) left join xmk_zhfz jc on sc.xmkid=jc.id
where gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')

select lx.xzqhdm v_0,lx.xzqhmc v_1,lx.lxbm v_2,lx.lxmc v_3,sc.scqdzh v_4,sc.sczdzh v_5,gc.sbsj v_6,jh.yjwgsj v_7,gc.wc_btz v_8, gc.wc_qttz v_9,jh.sjwgsj v_10,lx.bz v_11 from (select sum(wc_btz) wc_btz,sum(wc_qttz) wc_qttz,max(sbsj) sbsj,jhid from gcgl_zhfz where substr(sbyf,6,length(sbyf)-5) <=to_number(#{xmnf}) group by jhid )gc left join sck_zhfz sc on (gc.jhid=sc.sckid) left join plan_zhfz jh on (sc.sckid=jh.sckid) left join xmk_zhfz lx on sc.xmkid=lx.id
where gydwbm in(select id from xtgl_department where id like #{gydw}||'%' or parent like #{gydw}||'%')
order by wc_btz
